summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Center Department; authorizing execution of agreements to secure completion of, and to settle certain claims related to, the Seattle Center Resident Theatre Improvement Project; making an appropriation from the Seattle Center Improvement Fund for additional construction, claim settle, architectural and consultant and project administration costs; and allocating an appropriate sum for One Percent for Art, all connected with an improvement program contemplated by Ordinance 106629 (1977 Seattle Center Capital Improvement Bond Issue).
